directions: Pour prune juice into a blender. Layer Greek yogurt, spinach, blueberries, strawberries, peach, and flax seeds in the blender, in this order. Start blender on low speed and gradually increase speed until smoothie is well blended.
ingredients: 1 cup fresh spinach, or to taste
1 cup frozen blueberries, or to taste
title: Morning Energy Booster Smoothie
